{{title|1=operator==,!={{small|(std::experimental::pmr::polymorphic_allocator)}}}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions/pmr/polymorphic_allocator/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|1=
template&lt; class T1, class T2 &gt;
bool operator==( const polymorphic_allocator&lt;T1&gt;&amp; lhs, const polymorphic_allocator&lt;T2&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|1=
template&lt; class T1, class T2 &gt;
bool operator!=( const polymorphic_allocator&lt;T1&gt;&amp; lhs, const polymorphic_allocator&lt;T2&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares two polymorphic allocators. Two polymorphic allocators compare equal if their underlying memory resource compares equal.

@1@ Returns {{c|1=*lhs.resource() == *rhs.resource()}}.
@2@ Returns {{c|1=!(lhs == rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|polymorphic allocators to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|1=*lhs.resource() == *rhs.resource()}}
@2@ {{c|1=!(lhs == rhs)}}
